H4076.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Japheth<SDBH:יֶפֶת>}; ► regarded as the founder of the Medians

H3567.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, who allowed the exiles from {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} to return

H4061.def: = the overall dimensions or capacity of an object

72.gl: to cause (someone or some activity) to stop

H8450.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H563.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice

H3118.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H606.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; ≈ associated with mortality

H3479.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3567.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, who allowed the exiles from {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} to return

H783.def: = man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of {L:Ahasuerus<SDBH:אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ>} (Xerxes I); ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}; time of {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} and {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H3319.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H3118.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3479.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3879.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H8450.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H563.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice

H2409.def: = action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

H3479.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3879.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H4873.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H1473.def: = causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6453.def: = festival commemorating the time in Egypt when God killed the first-born of Egypt but spared the Israelites

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H2891.def: = process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H2889.def: = state in which an object is free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H6453.def: = festival commemorating the time in Egypt when God killed the first-born of Egypt but spared the Israelites

H1473.def: = causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1473.def: = causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H914.def: = action by which part of an entity is separated from the rest, either by detaching it completely it or by creating a kind of barrier (visible or invisible) between the selected part and the rest of the entity

H2932.def: = something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1875.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H2282.def: = celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

H4682.def: = thin cracker-like bread made without yeast

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H5437.def: = process by which a door is attached to a wall by means of a {L:hinge<SDBH:צִיר>}, or a contraption with a similar function, which allows it to pivot

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter
